TopicTitle: IF Jeb, Bob and Bill would drink a beer what would be the discussion..!??

Articles.Content: Hey, Jeb do u remember when u farted and u missed the docking ports!
The consistency of Minmus, if we are talking prior to being sent there but us players

"Jeb?"

"Ya?"

"You see dat Kerbal there? She looks purty"

"...aw yeah. I'm go and ask her someth'in"

I don't even know...
They would talk about if and how Kerbals would digest Beer and how they get that stench out of a sealed Spacesuit
Fantastic, this is just the kind of behavior we need at Kerbal Space Program. Keep it up guys.

Fantastic, this is just the kind of behavior we need at Kerbal Space Program. Keep it up guys.

Aw, come on. They are badass dudes which havent seen a female Kerbal in ages... of course they get a bit rude

Bill and Bob would sing backup on "You've Lost the Loving Feeling" while Jeb hits on Kelly McGillis. Later, we find out Kelly works in the R&D center back at KSC. Finally, we watch Jeb poignantly throw Bill and Bob's dog tags into the ocean after they are obliterated in a tragic crash on Minmus.

We need female Kerbals. That's all that's really missing to redo the entire movie in KSP.
"Why did you eat all of the snacks!?"

"Thank you, Jeb, for having the engineers put the ABORT button on my console."

*nods*

"But... I don't appreciate you also having them cut the wiring to it."

"Well, I needed to give you SOMETHING to do on the way up every launch."

"I don't think I've hit it once."

"Are you kidding me? The second the engines go, every single launch, you're playing whack-a-mole over there with the abort button!"

"... really?"
I imagine a lot of conversations starting with "Hey Jeb, remember that time you..." followed by a lot of laughter.

None of the 3 strike me as beerdrinkers.

Jeb: The wild and crazy one, does woowoo shots by the dozen. For them as don't know, woowoo glows green, comes by the dozen in laboratory test tubes stuck in holes drilled in a block of wood, and apparently is made of tequila, moonshine, absinthe, Spanish fly, boxing gloves, songbooks, horse testosterone, and rocket fuel.

Bill: The calm, steady one, slowly sips topshelf single-malt scotch or small-batch bourbon.

Bob: The fidgety, panicky one, quite obviously can't handle strong drink or even beer. When he's feeling frisky, which at most is about once a month, he has a single wine cooler. He's afraid of everything else. One time he had a Zima and it made him pass out, and he had a horrible headache the next day.
I'm pretty sure they'd be drinking Jeb's coffee. And about the only thing they'd be able to say is "ARHGGHGHGHGHGGHAAAAAAGHRGHAAAH!" from ingesting rocket fuel.

I would imagine they would get along like the astronauts of Apollo 12, as a group of the "original 3" who trained and worked together for a long time. Watch that episode of "From the Earth to the Moon" for what I'm talking about.
